verses.kjv: Now it came to pass in the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, in the fifth day of the month, as I was among the captives by the river of Chebar, that the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God.
verses.ct: On the 5th day of the 4th month, in the 30th year, while I was living among the exiles beside the Chebar River, the heavens opened up and I received visions from God.

verses.kjv: In the fifth day of the month, which was the fifth year of king Jehoiachin’s captivity,
verses.ct: This was the 5th day of the month, during the 5th year of King Jehoiachin's exile.

verses.kjv: The word of the LORD came expressly unto Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldeans by the river Chebar; and the hand of the LORD was there upon him.
verses.ct: The word of the LORD came directly to me, Ezekiel the priest, son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldeans beside the Chebar River. The power of the LORD came over me there.

verses.kjv: And I looked, and, behold, a whirlwind came out of the north, a great cloud, and a fire infolding itself, and a brightness was about it, and out of the midst thereof as the colour of amber, out of the midst of the fire.
verses.ct: I looked and saw a massive windstorm rushing in from the north — an enormous cloud surrounded by blazing fire that kept folding in on itself, with a brilliant glow all around it. At the center of the fire was something that gleamed like glowing amber.

verses.kjv: Also out of the midst thereof came the likeness of four living creatures. And this was their appearance; they had the likeness of a man.
verses.ct: From within the fire emerged what looked like 4 living creatures. They had a generally human form.

verses.kjv: And every one had four faces, and every one had four wings.
verses.ct: Each one had 4 faces and 4 wings.

verses.kjv: And their feet were straight feet; and the sole of their feet was like the sole of a calf’s foot: and they sparkled like the colour of burnished brass.
verses.ct: Their legs were straight, and the bottoms of their feet resembled the hooves of a calf. They gleamed like polished bronze.

verses.kjv: And they had the hands of a man under their wings on their four sides; and they four had their faces and their wings.
verses.ct: Under their wings on all 4 sides, they had human hands. All 4 of them had both faces and wings.

verses.kjv: Their wings were joined one to another; they turned not when they went; they went every one straight forward.
verses.ct: Their wings touched one another's. They didn't turn as they moved — each one traveled straight ahead.

verses.kjv: As for the likeness of their faces, they four had the face of a man, and the face of a lion, on the right side: and they four had the face of an ox on the left side; they four also had the face of an eagle.
verses.ct: As for their faces, each of the 4 had a human face in front, a lion's face on the right side, an ox's face on the left side, and an eagle's face at the back.

verses.kjv: Thus were their faces: and their wings were stretched upward; two wings of every one were joined one to another, and two covered their bodies.
verses.ct: That is how their faces looked. Their wings spread upward — each creature had 2 wings that connected to the wings of the creatures beside it, and 2 wings that covered its body.

verses.kjv: And they went every one straight forward: whither the spirit was to go, they went; and they turned not when they went.
verses.ct: Each one moved straight ahead. Wherever the spirit directed them to go, they went, without turning as they moved.

verses.kjv: As for the likeness of the living creatures, their appearance was like burning coals of fire, and like the appearance of lamps: it went up and down among the living creatures; and the fire was bright, and out of the fire went forth lightning.
verses.ct: The living creatures looked like burning coals of fire, like blazing torches. Fire moved back and forth among the creatures — it was intensely bright, and lightning flashed out of it.

verses.kjv: And the living creatures ran and returned as the appearance of a flash of lightning.
verses.ct: The living creatures darted back and forth like bolts of lightning.

verses.kjv: Now as I beheld the living creatures, behold one wheel upon the earth by the living creatures, with his four faces.
verses.ct: As I watched the living creatures, I noticed a wheel on the ground beside each creature — one for each of the 4 faces.

verses.kjv: The appearance of the wheels and their work was like unto the colour of a beryl: and they four had one likeness: and their appearance and their work was as it were a wheel in the middle of a wheel.
verses.ct: The wheels looked like they were made of something resembling topaz. All 4 were identical, and each one appeared to be constructed like a wheel intersecting another wheel at right angles.

verses.kjv: When they went, they went upon their four sides: and they turned not when they went.
verses.ct: They could move in any of the 4 directions without turning as they went.

verses.kjv: As for their rings, they were so high that they were dreadful; and their rings were full of eyes round about them four.
verses.ct: Their rims were enormous and terrifying, and all 4 rims were covered with eyes all the way around.

verses.kjv: And when the living creatures went, the wheels went by them: and when the living creatures were lifted up from the earth, the wheels were lifted up.
verses.ct: Whenever the living creatures moved, the wheels moved alongside them. When the creatures rose up from the ground, the wheels rose up too.

verses.kjv: Whithersoever the spirit was to go, they went, thither was their spirit to go; and the wheels were lifted up over against them: for the spirit of the living creature was in the wheels.
verses.ct: Wherever the spirit wanted to go, the creatures went, and the wheels rose right along with them, because the spirit of the living creatures was in the wheels.

verses.kjv: When those went, these went; and when those stood, these stood; and when those were lifted up from the earth, the wheels were lifted up over against them: for the spirit of the living creature was in the wheels.
verses.ct: When the creatures moved, the wheels moved. When the creatures stopped, the wheels stopped. When the creatures rose from the ground, the wheels rose with them, because the spirit of the living creatures was in the wheels.

verses.kjv: And the likeness of the firmament upon the heads of the living creature was as the colour of the terrible crystal, stretched forth over their heads above.
verses.ct: Spread out above the heads of the living creatures was something like an expanse, sparkling like awe-inspiring crystal, stretched out over them.

verses.kjv: And under the firmament were their wings straight, the one toward the other: every one had two, which covered on this side, and every one had two, which covered on that side, their bodies.
verses.ct: Beneath the expanse, their wings extended straight out toward each other. Each creature also had 2 wings covering one side of its body and 2 covering the other side.

verses.kjv: And when they went, I heard the noise of their wings, like the noise of great waters, as the voice of the Almighty, the voice of speech, as the noise of an host: when they stood, they let down their wings.
verses.ct: When they moved, I could hear the sound of their wings — it was like the roar of rushing water, like the voice of the Almighty, like the rumble of an army. When they stopped, they lowered their wings.

verses.kjv: And there was a voice from the firmament that was over their heads, when they stood, and had let down their wings.
verses.ct: Then a voice came from above the expanse over their heads as they stood still with their wings lowered.

verses.kjv: And above the firmament that was over their heads was the likeness of a throne, as the appearance of a sapphire stone: and upon the likeness of the throne was the likeness as the appearance of a man above upon it.
verses.ct: Above the expanse over their heads was something that looked like a throne made of sapphire, and seated on what appeared to be the throne was a figure that resembled a human being.

verses.kjv: And I saw as the colour of amber, as the appearance of fire round about within it, from the appearance of his loins even upward, and from the appearance of his loins even downward, I saw as it were the appearance of fire, and it had brightness round about.
verses.ct: From what appeared to be his waist upward, I saw something like glowing amber, like fire enclosed all around. From his waist downward, I saw what looked like fire, with a brilliant radiance surrounding it.

verses.kjv: As the appearance of the bow that is in the cloud in the day of rain, so was the appearance of the brightness round about. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the LORD. And when I saw it, I fell upon my face, and I heard a voice of one that spake.
verses.ct: The radiance surrounding him looked like a rainbow shining through the clouds on a rainy day. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the LORD. When I saw it, I fell facedown, and I heard a voice speaking.
